runs.comm: starts out full outside off stump and the ball swings through the air, a good sign, and Kallis gets forward and leaves the ball be for the wicketkeeper
and again a little bit of movement for Mills, pitches it up, and once more Kallis strides forward and shoulders arms ... its like day one of a Test in Napier
now Kallis decides to use the thing in his hands and flashes at another full and swinging delivery and gets two down to Butler at third man, who fumbles and allows a second
better length, just holding it back, Kallis steers to backward point
good stuff, hits a good length and shapes away from Smith, who feels for it and gets beaten by the good carry through to McGlashan ... Peter, that is, not our Andrew
too full and Smith leans into a square-drive, but Guptill throws himself around at point and takes some pace off the ball, thats good work by the fielder
starts off well, right up there on off stump to get Smith defending staunchly
walks across his stumps to try and do something different, but the ball is too full and he ends up turning it toward the midwicket region
thats down the pads, right where Kallis likes them, and with no fielder at square leg he clips it off the pads for four, good shot
better ball, hits a good length and shaping in from outside off stump so Kallis gets forward and defends to the off side
straighter ball, turned well toward the man at midwicket
good ball, pitches on a length and swings away, Smith tentatively pushes down the wrong line and gets beaten
pitches middle and leg, swings in, Kallis flicks to midwicket
makes some room to try and thrash the ball over point but Mills drops it short and wide and Kallis ends up flaying the bat at ball and connecting with nothing but air
fluent drive that, it was a half-volley, granted, but needed to be put away and Kallis played a thumping shot past extra cover for four, balance correct and all that jazz
back of a length outside off stump, Kallis sees the ball swing and then plays it late, running it down the ground to backward point, thats smart batting
pitches outside leg stump and Smith works it past square leg

miscued but still goes the distance! Kallis backs away and uses his feet to get some momentum going and connects well enough to thrash that over cover-point and thoughts it not timed perfectly he gets enough on it to dump it just over the ropes
change of pace, hits a good length, Smith runs it wide of point
speared into the pads, he clears the front leg and clips it for one
well fielded, Taylor! Smith makes room and throws the bat at a wide one, absolutely nailing a square drive, but Taylor intercepts superbly at cover
short of a length on leg stump, slower ball, Smith turns it away

pitched up on off stump and Kallis punched a drive in the air over Oram's hands, the ball drops safely in the deep and McCullum from mid-off collects and releases immeditately, had he hit Kallis would have been sweating
down the leg side, Smith uses his feet to try and flick but misses
drags it short and in a jiffy Smith short-arm-jabs the ball past midwicket but there's cover in the deep in the form of a sweeper so he gets just a single
offers some room outside off stump, allowing Smith free the arms and slice that over backward point, third man hustles but cannot cut it off
still a tad wide and Smith, without much footwork, chases it in the air toward backward point where the ball drops just short of Nathan McCullum
straighter ball and he works it across the stumps for a single
sharp movement back in, cuts back off a length and Kallis is cramped as he tries to run it down to third man, ends up taking it on the arm
full down leg stump, Kallis cannot connect but gets a leg bye
pitches it up outside off stump, Smith reaches out and drags the ball down just wide of mid-on for a single
hits a wide length first up and Smith dabs, getting third man into play
hits a length from back over the stumps, Kallis flicks it for one
goes back around when Smith is on strike and bowls a terrible ball, short and wide, so Smith reaches out and slaps the long hop past the fielders for four
searches for the yorker, doesn't quite nail it, and Smith makes room only to get an inside edge to the on side as he heaves at the straight delivery
pitches on a good length, Kallis square-drives it past point for one
wrong line, Diamanti continues to struggle, this one's in the slot and angling into leg stump so all Smith has to do is clear the front leg and go over mid-on for four
good start, flat outside off, no turn but it beats the bat
slides down Kallis' pads and raps them as he's late on the flick
good fielding off his own bowling, first he tosses it up on middle and leg, Kallis drives down the ground but in a flash McCullum dives across and saves runs
thats too full and Kallis clips it past mid-on for a single
slows it up, tosses it just outside off, Smith whips it past midwicket
starts to advance, McCullum fires it straighter and gets some turn away from Kallis, who ends up pushing it back to the bowler's left side

smart fielding at short midwicket! Butler drops it short of a length, it sits up and Smith short-arm-jabs it to the on side where Brendon McCullum intercepts and immediately releases and under-arm fling to the other end as Kallis is out of his crease, he has to turn back and stretch the bat out but McCullum finds his mark and Kallis is out by an inch. Very quick work from McCullum
back of a length on the stumps and Smith works it to the fielder
hits a length, angles away, Smith dabs it fine and Gibbs says come on
beats him first ball, holding back the length and getting some lift, Gibbs stands his crease and feels for it and could have easily gotten an edge, McGlashan fumbles
cuts through him again, pitching it up a fraction fuller and getting swing back in, Gibbs flirts and is beaten by the nip back in
oh what an over, third ball in a row Butler beats Gibbs, who just isn't using his feet  at all, with one thats even fuller and shaping back in gently
comes out and tries to whip the ball away but McCullum fields it
faster one, no turn, Smith dabs to point but gets sent back by Gibbs
wee bit of room, Smith gets over the ball and cuts it toward cover
tosses it up, Smith comes onto the front foot and drives to extra cover
down the pads and Gibbs gets off the mark with a clip past square
tossed up full and flat on the pads, thats clipped wide of square leg
hits a length outside off and Smith drives hard past extra cover
slants down Smith's pads but he eases it straight to the fielder
backs away a foot or so and drills a wide length ball to the off side, but Taylor stands in the way and saves at least a couple
slower ball down the leg side again, Smith brushes it to short fine
back of a length, angling back in to Gibbs who steers a single
directs a full and straight ball right on middle and off, dangerously Smith backs away, exposing all the sticks, and slashes the ball over point for four
pitches it up on off stump and Gibbs swings it past square leg
again he pitches it up just outside off stump, one of those seam-up wobblers, and Smith reaches out and tries to get six but miscues it over midwicket and it lands safely
soft dismissal that, just collects a return catch back in front of his face as Gibbs, without getting to the pitch of that gentle delivery, pops it straight back to Styris
a bit short and he cuts well but Nathan dives at backward point
beats him with an extra bit of bounce and some gentle shape away, pitches back of a length and sits up and Roelof is beaten as he fends at the ball
this time he gets over the ball, back-cuts it to the man on the ring
full toss outside off stump which he punches to cover

thats gone straight through Smith! Butler comes back and strikes immediately, pitching the ball up just outside leg stump and getting some shape, Smith plays all over the ball as he attempts to on-drive and middle and leg stumps are shattered
now he holds back the length outside off stump and Duminy is beaten as he hops up and feels for that one
another dot ball, this time as Duminy pulls and misses, the ball was just not there for that shot and he connects with cold air
too full outside leg stump, though it swings late Duminy gets a single, just managing a wee bit of bat on ball and placing it wide of square leg
good ball, hits a good length, straightens, and he dabs it to point
slow ball outside leg stump, Duminy swings and misses, the ball beats bat and McGlashan but he recovers well
tossed up around off stump and he works it square on the off side
goes for a big reverse sweep but cannot connect, the ball is going on down the stumps and the bowler appeals too late, so not that convincing at all, but Roelof looks clueless
bowled em! Roelof goes for a duck, advancing down the track but only ending up yorking himself to a quicker ball that skids back in to knock back leg stump
uses his feet first ball, coming out to collect on the full and driving it past mid-off
flat on off stump, Duminy shuffles and clips it past midwicket, runs hard and the man at the other end is even faster to thats excellent running thats get them two
confident shot! AB plays a spanking pull, off the front foot, in front of square as the bowler slightly errs in length, wasn't a bad ball though by any means
fuller in length and he on-drives a single with ease
gets up and fishes at a shorter ball, inside-edging past leg stump
full on the toes and he clips it out to deep backward square leg
nearly a yorker on middle and leg, makes room and drives to mid-off
swing and a miss, eyes shut, heaving across the line
a bit short and AB waits and hammers it past cover, Diamanti dives in the deep in vain, that was firmly cut off the back foot
too short again and this time AB swings it over square leg, it pitches safely in front of the man running in from the deep
comes down the track, chipping the ball away for a single
quicker ball, flat on leg stump, clipped wide of square leg

slower ball on a length, Duminy reaches out and collects on the full, pushing the ball past mid-off, he runs across and gets one but the call for the second was just not on as Guptill sprints in from long-off and gets AB short with a superb direct hit
flat outside off, strides forward and punches to extra cover
pitches on leg stump, Duminy flicks past midwicket for one
a bit short outside off and Boucher pulls past midwicket for one
bad ball, very wide down the leg stump, Duminy swings at it wildly and somehow gets a faint tickle on it, beating McGlashan and short fine leg for a crucial boundary
full on the pads, clipped away for one past midwicket
attempts a yorker but cant nail it, Boucher clips in the air past square
pitches just outside leg stump, Duminy cannot get bat on ball and it brushes his pads and drops near his feet

nearly a catch at short third man as Boucher reaches out and slashes an outside edge but the ball drops in front of Mills as he dives forward, so nearly got it but in the end misfielded and allowed two
full and wide, he reaches out and perforates the gap at cover
full toss on the pads, whipped out to the sweeper at deep square
aims for a yorker length outside off stump, a tad too full and Boucher slices it to the sweeper in the deep
good shot, good shot! Duminy manages to get underneath one as Oram just pitches on a length instead of full and this one's swung over mid-on for six
fuller this time and Duminy clips it across his stumps for one
full outside leg stump, Duminy makes room and flicks, the ball hits his pads and dribbles to the off side for a leg bye, again thats good bowling from Butler
simple catch to short extra cover as Boucher reaches out and scoops a low full toss from outside off stump straight to the man on the circle
bad ball, length ball but too wide down leg stump so thats wide
full toss again, down the pads, clipped to square leg for a single
drags it short of a length outside off stump and Albie pulls it between midwicket and mid-on, a good shot but Taylor dives on the ropes and parries to Guptill, good work
fuller length, Albie inside-edges a drive to the on side, Butler himself slides and dives, Duminy sends Albie back and he makes it back as the bowler releases the ball
full on leg stump and all Albie can get is an inside edge to gully
reaches out to drag a full delivery from outside off stump to midwicket
full outside leg stump, no room to work with, Duminy swings and the ball raps his pads and rolls to the on side

low full toss outside off stump, it dips and Albie reaches out and opens the face to try and chop it to third man but the ball drops dead at his feet, he looks perplexed but Duminy is alert and beckons him on for the manic single
super shot! Mills errs with a full toss and Duminy dumps that rows back over midwicket, all timing and placement, excellent work from him
gone this time though! Mills gets his man with a straighter one on the stumps, almost a yorker but not quite, Duminy gets under it looking for elevation but can only chip it down to mid-on
good yorker outside off stump, Albie drives to mid-off for one
another excellent yorker honing in on middle and leg and Albie can only jam it out to point for a single
a good yorker on the stumps and Botha clips it wide of midwicket
now he errs with a wide full toss, Albie swings it over mid-on
length ball this time, a bit wide but all Albie can get is a single cut away past the infield out to the man in the deep, excellent over from Oram so far
out comes the reverse sweep, but not timed well so only a single
high full toss outside off stump, Albie goes to slap it and gets a thin inside edge that McGlashan, standing up to the stumps, drops but Oram is cool with it and takes his cap and walks off smiling
